## Learning Objectives

By the end of this lecture, you will be able to:

- calculate confidence interval for a given sample proportion.
- calculate confidence interval for a given difference of two sample proportions.
- set and test hypotheses for population proportion.
- set and test hypotheses for difference of two proportions.
